name: A SnowCone in Winter
description:
Intake project for BUas. Made using C++ and SDL2

You play as a yeti working in an ice cream and coffee shop. With each passing day you are required to get more money and serve more and more customers. 

Controls:

  • WASD - movement
  • Mouse - picking up objects, giving out orders

Instructions

  • To pick up an object or deliver an order you need to walk up close to the icon and click on it.
